page.title: 10HOME LIFE
page.content: INDOOR GAMES WE ENJOY {MONOPOLY} MONOPOLY IS A BOARD GAME PLAYED WITH COUNTERS SHAPED AS CARS, BOATS,A SHOE, AN IRON OR A DOG.IT IS ABOUT THE COST OF DIFFERENT STREETS IN LONDON AND YOU HAVE TO BUY AND BUILD ON THEM. IT CAN GO ON FOR A VERY LONG TIME UNTIL EVERYONE IS BANKRUPT, HAS NO MONEY OR PROPERTIES. EVERYONE HAS A SET AMOUNT OF MONEY TO START WITH AND THEY HAVE TO PAY IF THEY LAND ON SOMEONE'S PROPERTY. YOU MOVE ACCORDING TO THE SCORE ON YOUR DICE. WHEN A PLAYER PASSES{GO}HE GETS Â£200 FROM THE BANK. THE BANK IS RUN BY THE BANKER WHO GETS SELECTED AT THE BEGINNING ON THE GAME. {GUESS WHO IT'S A GAME WITH PICTURES OF PEOPLE WITH NAMES AND YOU HAVE TO GUESS YOUR OPPONENT'S PERSON WHICH IS ON A CARD FACING HER.
